question.body: One of the functions of the subcutaneous level or hypodermis is to provide insulation for the body. What structure allows the hypodermis to perform this function?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Areolar tissue is used to help connect the epidermis to the underlying tissue.
Incorrect. Elastic fibers add elasticity to the tissue.
Correct. Adipose tissue stores fat, and fat is a good insulator.
Incorrect. Collagen provides structural support, not insulation.
